viirs/

get_viirs_quicklook.pro


top source GET_VIIRS_QUICKLOOK

result = GET_VIIRS_QUICKLOOK(FILENAME, RGB=RGB, ROI=ROI, ICOORDS=ICOORDS, QL_QUALITY=QL_QUALITY, VERBOSE=VERBOSE)

:Name: GET_MODISA_QUICKLOOK :Description: outputs a rgb modisa quicklook with roi overlay if requested :Calling sequence: RES = GET_MODISA_QUICKLOOK(FILENAME) :Params: FILENAME : A string containing the filename of the product for quicklook generation :Keywords: RGB : program generates an rgb colour quicklook (default is grayscale) ROI : Overlay coordinates of an roi in red (requires icoords) ICOORDS : A 4-element array of roi geolocation (n,s,e,w) QL_QUALITY : Quality of jpeg generated (100 = max, 0 = lowest) VERBOSE : Processing status outputs :Returns: STATUS : 1: nominal, (-1) or 0: error jpegs are automatically saved in filename folder :Common blocks: NONE :History: 1 FJul 2013 - D Marrable

Parameters

FILENAME

Keywords

RGB
ROI
ICOORDS
QL_QUALITY
VERBOSE
